en.name: Past Self in Mirror
en.description: Increases the wearer's Break Effect by {{60//70//80//90//100%}}. When the wearer uses their Ultimate, increases all allies' DMG by {{24//28//32//36//40%}}, lasting for 3 turn(s). Should the wearer's Break Effect exceed or equal 150%, 1 Skill Point will be recovered. At the start of each wave, all allies regenerate {{10//12.5//15//17.5//20}} Energy immediately. Effects of the same type cannot stack.

zh.name: 片刻，留在眼底
zh.description:
使装备者击破特攻提高{{60//70//80//90//100%}}。装备者施放终结技后，使我方全体造成的伤害提高 {{24//28//32//36//40%}}，持续3回合，并且若装备者击破特攻大于等于150%，则恢复1个战技点。
每个波次开始时，我方全体立即恢复{{10//12.5//15//17.5//20}}点能量，同类技能无法重复生效。
